<title level="1" pfs="">[Bodyguard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3513)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hired to protect someone famous or powerful, bodyguards use intimidation, quick wits, and martial skill to keep their charges safe. Such mercenaries might be auxiliaries to a noble's personal guards, but with special directives to safeguard their patrons.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bodyguard.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Bodyguard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3513)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 82

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +6, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +2

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72), [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 25

</row>

**Bodyguard's Reprisal** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature attacks the subject of bodyguard's defense; **Effect** The bodyguard makes a Strike against the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
greatclub +7 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d10+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sap +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +5 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Bodyguard's Defense** <actions string="Single Action" />  The bodyguard grants an adjacent ally a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. This lasts until the start of the bodyguard's next turn or until the ally is no longer adjacent, whichever comes first.

</column>
